name: Bleep Gets Blorped
description:
Bleep Gets Blorped is about a robot and his... Nothing, he's alone. Because his AI race was destroyed by some jerk-faces. The very jerk-faces that created them.

Anyhow, this is pretty much a work-in-progress. It's a jam entry, so expect all the quirks that come with that scenario. I managed to get 90% of the mechanics I wanted to employ running smoothly, designed and developed about the same percentage total of art assets, but sadly didn't manage to implement them in the final version.

Right now you can mob around in a couple spots, and shoot your guns. Push some boxes around. The sort of stuff sentient AI robots do, while we watch Netflix.
